Address: 32 WIGGINS AVENUE, BEDFORD, Massachusetts, 01730, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Founded in 1992, Anika Therapeutics, Inc. is a global, integrated joint preservation and regenerative therapies company based in Bedford, Massachusetts. Our mission is to be the global leader in orthopedic joint therapies and sports medicine with innovative technologies that exceed our customers' expectations. We are committed to delivering solutions to improve the lives of patients across a continuum of care from joint pain management and regenerative therapies to sports medicine and orthopedic joint preservation and restoration. We have nearly thirty years of global expertise commercializing more than twenty products based on our hyaluronic acid, or HA, technology platform, and we are focused on adding innovative and differentiated offerings to our consolidated portfolio. Our proprietary technologies for modifying the HA molecule allow product properties to be tailored specifically to multiple therapeutic uses.  ... More ...
